text:
@TheRickWilson @JohnJHarwood That hit my troll feed yesterday big time.  🤯
And questioning why 🤡 can’t walk and chew gum or what has 🤡 done SINCE impeachment does not go over well

We need to shut this down

The really lame trolls even went so far as to blame House Dems for not acting on #COVID19 🤦🏻‍♀️🤯

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
